_objs:
# {title} Attack mobile. If you are not in War mode, Stealth will switch it on before the attack. ### Params: *ObjID* : ID of Object. Can be a number (numerical or hex) OR name of object in ObjectsCollection (**DWS only** - read more about [Collections](Api/Collections))
### DWS\Pascal Script: ```pascal procedure Attack(ObjID : Cardinal); ``` DWS\Pascal Script Example: ```pascal if (WarTargetID <> Enemy) then attack(Enemy); ``` ### Python: ```python def Attack(AttackedID) ```
